competitors.name: Cadence Design Systems
competitors.notes: Primary competitor, one of the 'Big Three' EDA companies since the late 1980s

competitors.name: Mentor Graphics
competitors.notes: Part of the 'Big Three' EDA oligopoly, later acquired by Siemens in 2017

competitors.name: Avanti
competitors.notes: No. 4 company in EDA industry around 2000, later acquired by Synopsys in 2002

context: Around 2000, the EDA industry was dominated by three large companies - Synopsys, Cadence, and Mentor Graphics - forming an oligopoly established since the late 1980s. Synopsys specialized in front-end (logic synthesis) while Cadence led in back-end (physical layout and verification).
